documentation.short: This interface is intended to be provided by an ADC client and used by the ADC subsystem to retrieve the client's ADC configuration.
Returns the configuration of an ADC client.
documentation.long: Returns the configuration of an ADC client. adc_config_t is a hardware specific data type that contains all information necessary to configure the respective ADC hardware for the client. A client MUST always return the same configuration and, if configuration data is passed as a pointer, the ADC subsystem (HIL component) MUST NOT reference it after the return of this command. @return chip specific configuration.
